tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE trading_strategies (
 strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
 strategy_description TEXT,
 currency_pair VARCHAR(10),
 indicators_used TEXT,
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE trading_strategies (
    strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
    strategy_description TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    last_updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE backtesting_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id INT,
    backtest_date DATE,
    total_trades INT,
    successful_trades INT,
    profit DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE backtesting_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id INT,
    date DATE,
    profit DECIMAL(10, 2),
    trades INT
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id INT,
    date DATE,
    sharpe_ratio DECIMAL(10, 2),
    win_rate DECIMAL(5, 2),
    max_drawdown DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE backtesting_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id INT REFERENCES trading_strategies(strategy_id),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    metrics JSON
);

CREATE TABLE trade_history (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    result_id INT REFERENCES backtesting_results(result_id),
    trade_date DATE,
    trade_type VARCHAR(10),
    trade_symbol VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE trading_strategies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  strategy_type VARCHAR(50),
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE backtesting_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  total_profit DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_id INT,
  annual_return DECIMAL(10, 2),
  max_drawdown DECIMAL(10, 2),
  sharpe_ratio DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE trades (
  trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_id INT,
  symbol VARCHAR(10),
  buy_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  sell_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  trade_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE trade_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trade_id INT,
  action VARCHAR(10),
  execution_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  executed_at TIMESTAMP
)
